description.narrative:
Project Goal(s):
• To create an (extra-curricular) income generating, entrepreneurial opportunity for target group • To provide the target group with improved future perspectives (and reduce their, currently widely felt, dissatisfaction with society) • To create a cultural venue and meeting place with a public function • To enhance employment and employability of target group • To raise entrepreneurial spirit amongst target group

Project Results:
• Start-up two cultural enterprises: one in North-Mitrovica and one in South-Mitrovica • Social participation and inclination of youth and post-graduates

The project targets students and post graduates in North and South Mitrovica, since the program cannot escape the overwhelming demographic majority of Kosovo today falling into the 18-35 age range (over 55%).
Currently, students have difficulties finding additional work during their studies with the consequence that graduates lack working experience and the corresponding skills. KM empowers the target audience through skills proficiency, improvement of their employability and/or strength to create new jobs. KM provide the target audience with extra-curricular activities to develop skills like communication, teamwork, management, cooperation, information and communication technologies or organisational skills.

mailing-address.narrative: Stichting Young Urban Achievers Frederik Hendrikstraat 77 III 1052 HM AMSTERDAM

recipient-country.narrative: Kosovo Do not use !!! use other Kosovo
